## About spotoptim

`spotoptim` is a Python toolbox for Sequential Parameter Optimization (SPO), designed for robust and efficient optimization of expensive-to-evaluate functions.


## Surrogate Model Based Optimization

* Documentation for spotoptim see [Sequential Parameter Optimization Cookbook](https://sequential-parameter-optimization.github.io/spotoptim-cookbook/).
* News and updates related to SPOT see [SPOTSeven](https://www.spotseven.de)
